sentences.en: A perpendicular bisector of a chord passes through the centre and bisects the arc.
sentences.cn: 弦的垂直平分线经过圆心,并且平分弦所对的两条弧.

sentences.en: Let OC be the bisector of angle AOB.
The article discusses the determination and quality of angular bisector of two lines.
sentences.cn: 利用二次曲线的射影理论讨论了二直线夹角的平分线的确定与性质.

trans.tran_en: a straight line or plane that bisects an angle
